text: AuW-u03-bf ## 1. a) We assume, that "Anzahl Kanten über den Schnitt ( )" means # of edges with an incident vertex in each set ( ). We deﬁne an indicator variable: As all subsets are equally likely, the chance for every edge to have its vertices in diﬀerent subsets is .- Add 1/2 steps in the middle so it's ea sier to follow ~ Correct , but where's the rest ?
